title: Titans 13, Patriots 10 (2nd): Cam Ward keeping Tennessee afloat

bullets: New England Patriots Mike Vrabel is facing off against a Titans team that he coached for six seasons.

title: 3 takeaways as the Revolution’s 2025 season came to an end with a 2-2 draw against Chicago
author: Hayden Bird
bullets: New England Revolution New England's season ended fittingly, surrendering a late equalizer to squander a chance at a dramatic win.
Carles Gil applauds the Revolution fans after the 2025 season came to an end following the 2-2 draw against Chicago.
Via New England Revolution/MLS By Hayden Bird October 19, 2025 | 10:16 AM 4 minutes to read The Revolution tied the Chicago Fire 2-2 at Gillette Stadium on Saturday night.

title: Payton Pritchard praises rookie Hugo Gonzalez’s game ahead of Celtics season opener

" Hugo Gonzalez could make his NBA debut on Wednesday if he checks in during the Celtics' opener.

title: Why font on nameplate of TreVeyon Henderson’s jersey looks small
author: Conor Roche
bullets: New England Patriots The font on Henderson's nameplate has been one of the biggest mysteries in the NFL so far this season.
Many have noticed the font of TreVeyon Henderson's name on his jersey is relatively small.

(AP Photo/Bruce Kluckhohn) By Conor Roche October 18, 2025 | 4:15 PM 1 minute to read When TreVeyon Henderson joins the Patriots’ huddle on offense, the back of his jersey sticks out like a sore thumb.

title: How that oft-misinterpreted Celtics’ media game blowout could end up an epiphany for Joe Mazzulla
author: Chad Finn

Joe Mazzulla takes questions from the media.

title: ‘No Kings’ protest in Boston: What protesters said and why they showed up
author: Frances Klemm
bullets: Local News Demonstrators filled Boston Common Saturday for the nationwide “No Kings” protests, sharing their concerns about democracy and the direction of the country.
A group of protestors hold up signs at the "No Kings" rally on Boston Common.
Kelly Chan/Boston.
